title: 85/495/EEC: Council Decision of 4 November 1985 concerning the conclusion of a Community-COST concertation agreement on a concerted action project in the field of teleinformatics (COST Project 11ter)
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 4 November 1985
concerning the conclusion of a Community-COST concertation agreement on a concerted action project in the field of teleinformatics (COST Project 11ter)
(85/495/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Community-COST Concertation Agreement between the European Economic Community and Austria, Finland, Norway, Sweden, Switzerland and Yugoslavia on a concerted action project in the field of teleinformatics (COST Project 11ter) is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached hereto.
The President of the Council shall give the notification provided for in Article 6 (1) of the Agreement.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 November 1985.
For the Council
The President
R. GOEBBELS
(1) OJ No L 231, 13. 9. 1979, p. 23.
(2) OJ No L 308, 27. 11. 1984, p. 49.
